sc.fiji.snt.gui

Class FADerivedIcon

  • java.lang.Object
    • sc.fiji.snt.gui.FADerivedIcon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.swing.Icon

    public class FADerivedIcon
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.Icon
    Creates icons from Font Awesome Glyphs: High-quality icons that render well at any screen resolution. Based on code from Mario Torre (GPL-2) and Andres Almiray (Apache-2.0), with tweaks and updates for font awesome 5.0.
    Author:
    Tiago Ferreira
